parameters.ALLSKY_SFC_SW_DWN: All Sky Surface Shortwave Downward Irradiance (kW-hr/m²/day)

metadata.notes: PRECTOTCORR annual totals are converted from mm/day to mm/year using days-per-month weighting.

climate_profile.source: ESTIMATED - filled from nearby ARID zone and typical Saharan values (placeholder). Recommended: re-run NASA POWER / ERA5 for authoritative data.

precipitation.note: Low and highly variable; oasis irrigation dominates agriculture

variability.note: Values are estimated placeholders. For modeling fidelity re-run dataset fetch from NASA POWER or ERA5.
